summary: En route to Hollywood, singer Steve, his partner Seymour and fiancée Jane, Jane's airheaded roommate Irma, and Irma's con artist fiancé Al have a series of misadventures and end up involved with a murderous gang.
cast: John Lund|Marie Wilson|Diana Lynn|Dean Martin|Jerry Lewis|Corinne Calvet|Lloyd Corrigan|Don Porter|Harold Huber|Joseph Vitale|Charles Evans|Kenneth Tobey|Dick Stabile|Tamba the Chimp|Ivan Browning|George Bruggeman|Gordon Carveth|David Clarke|Richard Clayton|James Conaty|James Davies|Charles Dayton|Jimmie Dundee|Al Ferguson|James Flavin|Frank Gerstle|Jody Gilbert|Roy Gordon|Herschel Graham|Joe Gray|Sam Harris|Helene Hatch|Joe Hecht|Gil Herman|Rose Higgins|George Humbert|Michael Jeffers|Bobby Johnson|Stan Johnson|Paul Lees|Harry Lewis|Mike Mahoney|Margarita Martín|Kermit Maynard|Walter Merrill|Harold Miller|Lee Miller|Joe Molina|Julia Montoya|Marian Mosick|Ottola Nesmith|Wendell Niles|Gregg Palmer|Jose Portugal|Suzanne Ridgway|Jeffrey Sayre|Charles Sherlock|Helen Sky Eagle|Brick Sullivan|Maxie Thrower|Edward Wahrman|Jasper Weldon|Napoleon Whiting|Henry Wills|Chief Yowlachie
title: Mi Amiga Irma va al Oeste
